I think I have to look in DVDR category....but i couldn't find it, so could you rip or put the subs or something like that? sorry if I comment not related with this torrent...I'm newbie here....but thank you anyway

You can find subs for just about any show at TVsubtitles.net

I am not associated with this site, and there may be other sites just as good.

For season 1 of The Tudors: http://www.tvsubtitles.net/tvshow-76-1.html

I should have said, I have found *English* subs for every show I looked for. They also have other languages, but possibly there are specialized sites that are better for other languages... They do have 12 languages for season 1 of this show, but no German, Romanian,  or Scandinavian languages.

The whole season of subs for this release can be downloaded (currently) at http://www.sub-titles.net/ppodnapisi/podnapis/i/270794/the-tudors-2007-subtitles

The release version that matches this one at tvsubtitles.net is "DVD-WIDE" - but full-season download is not currently working.
